messages.message:
i pulled latest master, compiled and reran, and i’m still seeing:
```/api/v1/drives/colinmackenzie/my-repo/fs failed with message: 404 Not Found: The requested URL was not found on the server. If you entered the URL manually please check your spelling and try again. retrying 2 more times```
Was that with the `provisioner.py` command you sent earlier? That doesn’t build the containers from master, it will pull down the most recent build, which might not have it yet.

messages.sender: cross talk - a podcast about crosswords - listen on apple podcasts or spotify
messages.message: oo okay good to know
You can remove the flag to build it though. That’s the `use-prebuilt`
(Though maybe only do that for the one service so you don’t wait while it builds EVERYTHING :smile: )
